summary: An alternative set of models and textures for various objects in blackreach.
descriptionHtml:
[size=10]Alternative Blackreach Objects [/size]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bsx5N3bl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=2]By Aiyen [/size]

[size=5]Description: [/size]
Once upon a day I was underground and saw stuff that haunted my dreams!... Well that would be a good start to a story but this one is much simpler.

I went underground noticed a few things that I just thought looked silly and wrong and then made some alternative versions for use in my modlist and now I share with ya all.

[size=2]The Blackreach Sun [/size]

The vanilla design is actually quite nice.. however I found the model rather interresting to work with, and thought it would be nice with a more shiny version. So I did some new textures and some model work to create a look of a liquid core with some metal grid floating on top... as well as making it shine.

[size=2]The Blackreach Crystals [/size]
Never liked em... most likely never will! Redid the model, and the textures and made a fancy looking crystal that can change color depending on the lighting.

[size=2]The other stuff [/size]
I also altered the color of the bushes so they do not stand out as teal dots in the landscape... as well as make the tentacles from the ceiling less glowy.

[size=5]Installation: [/size]
It is simple textures and meshes use your mod manager to install and remove like normal. Folder structure should be correct!

I provide one pack with everything, and two separate for the sun and crystals.

The Crystal meshes are based on the SMIM UV corrected ones, so they are fine to overwrite!

[size=5]"Incompatibilities" [/size]
The sun is based on the vanilla pattern design.. so if you somehow got a retexture that alters this...then you will get a funky looking sun with the wrong parts looking shiny. I am not aware of any textures that alter this however, but figured I would mention it.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CCOyRdAl.jpg[/IMG]


Credits:
Bethesda for the game and all the goodies to play with!
Brumbek for making SMIM! His UV work have been used a base for my model changes.

Permissions:
If you want to use these assets in your own mod, please ask me first! I will most likely agree it is the best idea since sliced bread!
I do not give permission for these assets to be redistributed to other sites then the Nexus.
author: Aiyen
